dim.name: nIsoLevels
dim.description: Number of isobaric levels to which variables will be vertically interpolated

var.name: iso_levels
var.description: Levels for vertical interpolation to isobaric surfaces

var.name: mslp
var.description: Mean sea-level pressure

var.name: temperature_isobaric
var.description: Temperature vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: dewpoint_isobaric
var.description: Dewpoint temperature vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: relhum_isobaric
var.description: Relative humidity vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: qvapor_isobaric
var.description: Water vapor mixing ratio vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: uzonal_isobaric
var.description: Reconstructed zonal wind at cell centers vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: umeridional_isobaric
var.description: Reconstructed meridional wind at cell centers vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: height_isobaric
var.description: Geometric height interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: geoheight_isobaric
var.description: Geopotential height interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: w_isobaric
var.description: Vertical velocity vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: vorticity_isobaric
var.description: Vertical vorticity at cell centers vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: ertel_pv_isobaric
var.description: Ertel's potential vorticity vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_lw_isobaric
var.description: Diabatic EPV tendency from longwave radiation vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_sw_isobaric
var.description: Diabatic EPV tendency from shortwave radiation vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_bl_isobaric
var.description: Diabatic EPV tendency from PBL vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_cu_isobaric
var.description: Diabatic EPV tendency from convection vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: dtheta_dt_mp_isobaric
var.description: Potential temperature heating rate from microphysics vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: dtheta_dt_dyn_isobaric
var.description: Potential temperature tendency from dynamics vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: dtheta_dt_cu_isobaric
var.description: Potential temperature tendency from cumulus scheme vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_mp_isobaric
var.description: Diabatic EPV tendency from microphysics vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_mp_evap_cw_isobaric
var.description: Diabatic EPV tendency from microphysics - net condensation/evaporation of cloud water - vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_mp_evap_rw_isobaric
var.description: Diabatic EPV tendency from microphysics - evaporation of rain water - vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_mp_depo_ice_isobaric
var.description: Diabatic EPV tendency from microphysics - net deposition/sublimation of all ice hydrometeors - vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_mp_melt_ice_isobaric
var.description: Diabatic EPV tendency from microphysics - melting of all ice hydrometeors - vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_mp_frez_ice_isobaric
var.description: Diabatic EPV tendency from microphysics - freezing of all ice hydrometeors - vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_mp_allproc_isobaric
var.description: Diabatic EPV tendency from summed microphysics processes vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_dyn_isobaric
var.description: EPV tendency from dynamics vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_mix_isobaric
var.description: Diabatic EPV tendency from explicit numerical mixing vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_diab_isobaric
var.description: Sum of calculated EPV tendencies from diabatic processes vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: depv_dt_fric_isobaric
var.description: Sum of calculated EPV tendencies from frictional processes vertically interpolated to isobaric levels

var.name: acc_depv_dt_lw_isobaric
var.description: Accumulated diabatic EPV tendency from longwave radiation vertically interpolated to isobaric levels
